meanings.definition: To go beyond the limits of
meanings.sent1: She transcended her fears and tried something new.
meanings.sent2: The athlete transcended all expectations and won the race.
meanings.sent3: The cat transcended its usual laziness and chased a mouse around the house.
meanings.sent4: His determination transcended any obstacles in his path.
meanings.sent5: The music transcended language barriers and touched the hearts of all who listened.

meanings.sent1: Their friendship transcended distance and time.
meanings.sent2: The student's grades transcended those of his classmates.
meanings.sent3: The cake transcended deliciousness and became legendary in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness transcended mere politeness and left a lasting impact.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the sunset transcended description, leaving everyone in awe.

meanings.definition: To rise above or go beyond the ordinary
meanings.sent1: His art transcended mere drawings and became masterpieces.
meanings.sent2: The leader's vision transcended the current state of affairs.
meanings.sent3: The dog transcended its usual tricks and learned to skateboard.
meanings.sent4: Her wisdom transcended her years, surprising everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The love they shared transcended any hardships, making their bond unbreakable.
